subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: March Madness may be the best three weeks in sports, but baseball’s opening day is the most invigorating 24 hours we have. A celebration of new life, a new season, legitimate hope and a clean slate.
snippet: March Madness may be the best three weeks in sports, but baseball’s opening day is the most invigorating 24 hours we have. A celebration of new life, a new season, legitimate hope and a clean slate.
